name: CalmRadio-MusictoSuper-Relax
0:
”Alexa, open Calm Radio”
”Alexa, ask Calm Radio to play solo piano and guitar”
”Alexa, ask Calm Radio to play smooth jazz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Since 2009, now available on over 20 apps, Calm Radio has the world's largest collection of over 500 music channels for easy-listening, sleep stories, wellness music, relaxing classical for work, focus & meditation. 

Listen to classical music from every composer like Mozart, Beethoven, Bach and Brahms. 
Enjoy many super-relaxing classical instrument channels like Light Classical, Solo Classical Piano, Classical Guitar, Solo Violin, and Cello.
Enjoy acoustic pop channels like Coffee House, Pop Ballads, and channels from any era, like 60's, 80's, 90's and more.

We have the world's largest collection of Wellness music, meditations, sleep stories, mindfulness, an incredible selection of sleep music and sounds, music for focus and concentration, music for anxiety and depression and more.
Nature Sounds are used nightime, sleep-aids, for symptoms of ringing-in-the-ears or Tinnitus, anxiety issues, and even pet-sitting.

Enjoy Calm Radio's most popular channels, including Solo Piano and Guitar, Sleep, Spa, and Smooth Jazz.

Listen for free at http://calmradio.com. No credit card required.

Subscribing members get access to dozens of bonus channels - including Premium channels like nature sounds, audiobooks, and exclusive content from YoYo Ma and Yanni.
